definitions.definition: an inanimate object worshiped for its supposed magical powers or because it is considered to be inhabited by a spirit.
examples: juju, talisman, charm, amulet; Moretotem, idol, image, effigy "an African fetish"Moretotem, idol, image, effigy an African fetish

definitions.definition: a course of action to which one has an excessive and irrational commitment.
examples: he had a fetish for writing more opinions each year than any other justice

definitions.definition: a form of sexual desire in which gratification is linked to an abnormal degree to a particular object, item of clothing, part of the body, etc.
examples: Victorian men developed fetishes focusing on feet, shoes, and boots
